Units

Class ArmyUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • Units.MoveableUnit
      • Units.ArmyUnit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cavalry, Conjured, FlyingConjured, FlyingUnit, LandUnit, RangedLandUnit

    public class ArmyUnit
extends MoveableUnit
    CS 383 Software Engineering changed 'demorlized' to 'demoralized' before the problem spread

    Army Unit extends the MoveableUnit class. This class addresses the combat side of all basic units(ie not monsters and characters). This contains the the strength, demoralized strength, and other variables that are associated and needed for army units.

    The functions in this class are mostly getters and setters for the various member variables in the class.
